`$=customJS.dv_funcs.mentionedIn(dv)`

#### <s class="topic-title">[[autism spectrum]]</s>

Implied when referring to [[Autism]], the autism spectrum refers to the range of 

> [!wikipedia] [autism spectrum](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Autism%20spectrum)
> 
> The autism spectrum is an umbrella term covering a range of neurodevelopmental conditions referred to as autism spectrum disorder (ASD). 
> 


**See**::
*`$=customJS.dv_funcs.outlinedIn(dv, this)`*
